attribution: Images are either from private collection or from Wikimedia Commons licensed under Creative Commons.
data_warning_message: Browsing galleries consume a lot of internet data, as the images need to be downloaded from Wikimedia Commons!
disclaimer: The contents of this app are sourced from various wikis hosted by Wikimedia. The app creator cannot therefore guarantee the validity of the information. The app is a simple tool for the Nias wiki community members to browse and edit wiki pages.
english_selected: English is selected for the interface language!
enter_a_word_to_create: Enter the word to a new page...
gallery_attribution: All photos and graphic arts in the galleries are streamed directly from Wikimedia Commons and licensed by Creative Commons.
goal_nias: Set Nias language free for the digital age
id_selected: Bahasa Indonesia dipilih untuk bahasa antar muka!
initialization_failed_desc: The application could not start correctly. Please try restarting the app.
motto_nias: By the community, for the community, for the next generation of Nias speaking people
nias_selected: Te'oroma'ö sa'ae ngawalö menu ba li Niha
no_back:
No more pages. 
You've reached the very first visited page
no_forward:
No more pages. 
You've reached the last visited page
onboarding1_desc: Read, edit, and create new entries in local languages.
onboarding2_desc: Easily switch to Dark Mode and adjust the font size.
onboarding3_desc: The handy search icon is always ready on the main screen.
onboarding4_desc: Quickly Search and effortlessly Create a new entry.
onboarding5_desc: Access Share, Edit, and View on the Web icons directly on the AppBar.
onboarding6_desc: Find the vital community shortcuts within the main menu drawer.
onboarding7_desc: Change the app language, adjust the font size, and set the Dark Mode.
onboarding8_desc: Other local Wiktionary pages haven't been optimised yet for mobile.
search_what: What do you want to search?
select_wiki: Select the wiki to work on:
settings_message: Select the project to work on. You can set the language and font size in the Settings later.
unoptimized_language_warning: The pages of this Wiktionary have not been optimised for mobile aplication display. Pages may load very slow or are not properly displayed.
wikinias_slogan2: Moroi khöda, soguna khöda ba soguna khö ndraonoda miföna.
